meanings.definition: A building used for religious or community gatherings.
meanings.sent1: The meetinghouses in our town are where people come together to worship.
meanings.sent2: We passed by several meetinghouses on our way to the park.
meanings.sent3: The meetinghouses seemed to be whispering secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The meetinghouses stood tall like guardians of the community.
meanings.sent5: The meetinghouses echoed with the sounds of shared stories and laughter.

meanings.sent1: There are many meetinghouses in this city.
meanings.sent2: The meetinghouses were beautifully decorated for the event.
meanings.sent3: The meetinghouses lined up like soldiers ready for duty.
meanings.sent4: The meetinghouses filled the street with a sense of unity.
meanings.sent5: The meetinghouses symbolized the strength of the community.
